library(nycflights13)
library(tidyverse)

View(flights)
View(airports)

flights_arrange = arrange(flights, desc(distance))

flights_slice = slice(flights_arrange, 1)

farthest_airport = 
  left_join(flights_slice, airports, by = c("dest" = "faa")) %>%
  select(name) %>%
  as.character()
